text: Ki Daophet Niuhuang () was a singer from Laos, in the genre Mor lam. He was born on 1 July 1972. == Career == He started on stage in 1994, with his brothers who founded Mor lam music band Num Kosin, and he started as a solo artist in 1997. He has many popular songs include Nam Ta Kway, Jee Hoy,สิ้นราชาลูกทุ่งลาว ตำนานเพลง'จี่หอย' Nam Ta Luk Phoo Chay, Fa Oum Fon Kue Khon Oum Nong, Miea Mak Phay, and Koy Nong Kuen Udom Xai. In 2014, Niuhuang and Pueng Rassamee released a studio album, Sao Mak Nao Bao Na Wang, and in 2018, Niuhuang and Prang Buppha relased single Bao Vientiane Hak Xao Nongkhai. He died on 24 April 2020. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Singers Category:Laotian people
title: Ki Daophet Niuhuang
